indra.name: Indra
indra.description: Indra Sistemas, S.A. is a Spanish information technology and defense company. Indra is listed on the Bolsa de Madrid and is a constituent of the IBEX 35 index. The current executive chairman is √Ångel Escribano.

santander.name: Banco Santander
santander.description: Banco Santander S.A. trading as Santander Group, is a Spanish multinational financial services company based in Santander, with operative offices in Madrid. Additionally, Santander maintains a presence in most global financial centres as the 14th-largest banking institution in the world.
